feed.title: Category: Video and Voice Chat | Random thoughts | Hari KT

entry.title: Gmail Voice and Video Chat Plugin
entry.content: Gmail has introduced the voice and video chat for a while .Â  But its still not available for GNU/Linux . The screenshot of it when I checked for the plugin is given below . Google has announced the Google Chrome OS in the 2010 , which will be running on the top of Linux Kernel . I am hoping that the voice and video chat will be available from 2010 for GNU/Linux systems .
